provider.name: Orange (Moldova)
provider.description: Cell provider Orange Moldova (https://my.orange.md). Provides info on Orange Abonament and Internet Acum.
provider.instruction:
To access your account:

  • select the type of your account (Internet Acum or Abonament)
  • enter your Orange number as it is indicated in your contract
  • enter the personal code from the Client Card provided to the owner of the contract upon signing up for the monthly plan.
provider.author: Dmitry Kochin <dco@mail.ru>
